inject-flags.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated InjectFlags enum

test-bed-get.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated TestBed.get method with TestBed.inject

control-flow-migration.description: Converts the entire application to block control flow syntax

router-current-navigation.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated Router.getCurrentNavigation method with the Router.currentNavigation signal

add-bootstrap-context-to-server-main.description: Adds `BootstrapContext` to `bootstrapApplication` calls in `main.server.ts` to support server rendering.
